Title: Establishes Eid Ul-Fitr and Eid Ul-Adha as public holidays
Summary: Establishes Eid Ul-Fitr and Eid Ul-Adha as public holidays, with dates established by religious law and tradition.
LawCode: Amd ยง24, Gen Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general construction law, in relation to establishing Eid Ul-Fitr and Eid Ul-Adha as public holidays
